verses.verse: A Psalm <S%H4210><s%> or Song <S%H7892><s%> for the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Korach <S%H7141><s%>. His foundation <S%H3248><s%> is in the holy <S%H6944><s%> mountains <S%H2042><s%>.
The YY <S%H3068><s%> loveth <S%H157><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the gates <S%H8179><s%> of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> more than all the dwellings <S%H4908><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>.
Glorious things <S%H3513><s%> <S%H8737><s%> are spoken <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8794><s%> of thee, O city <S%H5892><s%> of 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.

I will make mention <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8686><s%> of Rachav <S%H7294><s%> and Babylon <S%H894><s%> to them that know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8802><s%> me: behold Philistia <S%H6429><s%>, and TZor <S%H6865><s%>, with Ethiopia <S%H3568><s%>; this man was born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> there.

And of TZiyon <S%H6726><s%> it shall be said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, This and that man <S%H376><s%> was born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> in her: and the highest <S%H5945><s%> himself shall establish <S%H3559><s%> <S%H8787><s%> her.

The YY <S%H3068><s%> shall count <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, when he writeth up <S%H3789><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the people <S%H5971><s%>, that this man was born <S%H3205><s%> <S%H8795><s%> there. Selah <S%H5542><s%>.
As well the singers <S%H7891><s%> <S%H8802><s%> as the players <S%H2490><s%> <S%H8802><s%> on instruments shall be there: all my springs <S%H4599><s%> are in thee.
